about_the_game:
Drop in and experience this fast paced battle royale style survival game. In Project Bonsai, you are thrown onto an island with nothing, and must fight and craft your way to survival. There are more than 10 unique crafting and combat skills, from magic and ranged to mining and farming. With over 100 unique items, you can craft recipes and abilities to help you progress through the tough challenges and objectives, and ready yourself for enemies and bosses on each island.

Project Bonsai is a single-player game where you must complete unique objectives to clear each island. There are dozens of different islands and levels that offer limitless progression. There are over 50 achievements, and additionally online highscores where you can compare yourself to your friends, region and even the world. Will anyone manage to clear all of the islands?
